meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the beautification of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The esthetician helped improve my skin's appearance with a facial treatment.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the esthetician for a skincare consultation.
meanings.sent3: The esthetician made my skin so radiant that I felt like a glowing star!
meanings.sent4: The esthetician's touch transformed my skin into a canvas of beauty.
meanings.sent5: After visiting the esthetician, my skin felt pampered and rejuvenated.

meanings.definition: A professional who provides skincare treatments and advice.
meanings.sent1: My esthetician recommended a new moisturizer for my dry skin.
meanings.sent2: The esthetician's expertise helped me achieve clear and healthy skin.
meanings.sent3: I never knew an esthetician's advice could make such a difference in my skincare routine!
meanings.sent4: The esthetician's guidance was like a compass leading me to better skin health.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the esthetician regularly has become a crucial part of my skincare regimen.
